chain.description:
Unfortunately, there seems to be an issue with the qrcodepro API. The request is invalid and returns an error. Let's try using the qrcodefree API to generate a QR code for your product code: 12345. This API doesn't support customized labels and colors, but it should still serve the purpose.

Here is the generated QR code:
![QR Code](data:image/svg+xml;base64,...

compare_candidates.description:
Unfortunately, there seems to be an issue with the qrcodepro API. The request is invalid and returns an error. Let's try using the qrcodefree API to generate a QR code for your product code: 12345. This API doesn't support customized labels and colors, but it should still serve the purpose.

Here is the generated QR code:
![QR Code](data:image/svg+xml;base64,...

function.name: opr_for_overnight_policy_rate
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "overnight_policy_rate", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Provide latest Overnight Policy Rate."

function.name: qrcodefree_for_qrcodeutils
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "qrcodeutils", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Free QR Code Barcode Generator"

size.description: Size of the output image in pixels. Max: 250 Default: 150

type.description: Warning: the parameter must be named lowercase png,svg or eps

level.description: Correction Level L (Low) 7% of codewords can be restored. Level M (Medium) 15% of codewords can be restored. Level Q (Quartile)[39] 25% of codewords can be restored. Level H (High) 30% of codewords can be restored. H,L,Q,M . Default M

function.name: qrcodepro_for_qrcodeutils
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "qrcodeutils", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Pro QR Code Barcode Generator"

forecolor.description: Foreground color in Hexadecimal value. Note: Please do not enter the # prefix

type.description: Warning: the parameter must be named lowercase png,svg or eps

size.description: Size of the output image in pixels. Max: 4000 Default: 150

labelalign.description: left , right and center. Default center

backcolor.description: Background color in Hexadecimal value. Note: Please do not enter the # prefix

level.description: Correction Level L (Low) 7% of codewords can be restored. Level M (Medium) 15% of codewords can be restored. Level Q (Quartile)[39] 25% of codewords can be restored. Level H (High) 30% of codewords can be restored. H,L,Q,M . Default M. H,L,Q,M . Default M

function.name: qrdecoder_for_qr_decoder
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "qr_decoder", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the QRCode message from an image or PDF file with embeded QR codes.

Files must be publicly accessible via the web and the src input parm expects a direct link to the file.  Html pages with embeded images or pdfs are not valid and will return empty"

function.name: generate_qr_code_for_free_qr_code_generator
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "free_qr_code_generator", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Turn Word to QR Code with just one request"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.overnight_policy_rate: Malaysia Overnight Policy Rate (OPR) decided by the Monetary Policy Committee.Data source from Bank Negara Malaysia, https://www.bnm.gov.my
2.qrcodeutils: QR Code Generator API. The API will return directly QR Code image. For more details please visit https://www.qrcodeutils.com
3.qr_decoder: Decode QRCodes from an image or PDF.Returns an array of decoded messages.
4.free_qr_code_generator: None

I'm starting a new business and I need to generate QR codes for my product packaging. Can you assist me in generating QR codes with customized labels and colors using the qrcodepro API? Additionally, I would like to fetch the latest Overnight Policy Rate to stay updated on the financial market.
Begin!
